0.1.name: wordpress/burping-the-corpse-sidebar-widget
0.1.description: Adds a Burping The Corpse badge widget for use in your WordPress sidebar. The widget displays a Burping The Corpse badge and the latest posts from the Burping The Corpse blog (the feed and title can be customized through the widget options). There are 2 badge images to choose from, or no image. Also, you have the option of adding an rss feed of your choice, and adding html before and after the feed, essentially allowing you to use it for any rss feed. Tested on WordPress 2.3 - WordPress 3.3.1.
